title: AHS 1984 Episode 1 Review & Synopsis
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment:
I got 2 theories to what might be the twist...
1) Cody fern’s character and possibly other camp staff are preparing for a slasher movie and is going to kill because method acting. Would explain the screen test? 
2) the light Margaret described was aliens.

I feel like the clip where Brooke mistakes Leslie for mr jingles in the lightning shot was foreshadowing. Leslie killed those kids having a 3 way, everyone else and cut off her own ear to frame mr jingles.
Take it from someone born in 64. The hitchhiker was dressed 70s style hippie so there may be a timey winey thing in the story. Maybe aliens took him from the camp in 70 and dropped him back in 84.

In most if not all 80's slasher flicks, The victims always did stupid stuff like Brooke leaving the window open after learning when serial killers strike the most. In my opinion it was done written like that on purpose as one of many references to the slasher genre.
I really hope, if there is a twist; that it’s MINDBLOWING
